entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
BREEZY AND NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, DIMINISHING TO 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 60
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
